title: Issues with GoogleFit when ending walkout is forgotten.
content:
There are several times recently when I finish walking and leave my phone on the table without ending activity (walk) in the GoogleFit which is created before. When I pick the phone some hours later, I found two issues:

1) The battery nearly drained out (remained about 15%) though at the time I finished walking the battery remained over 70%. Note that on my routine usage without using GoogleFit, 70% battery could last more than one day.
Look at the battery usage I saw GoogleFit used about 15%, the sum of other usages is about 10%. 
So the total percentage = 15%(remained) + 15%(Fit) + 10%(others) = 40%. I did not know where the other 60% of the battery went.

2) In the "Journal" I opened the last walk item and saw the walking track line is a straight line starting from West of China, crossing Korea and Japan, and ending at the middle of the Pacific Ocean. That is so ridiculous since I just walked on a track whose length does not beyond 3 km.
